# Process blocking SIGTERM (bit 14 in mask = signal 15)
# SIGTERM blocked is medium severity - may delay graceful termination
Name:	blocking_app
State:	R (running)
Tgid:	3000
Pid:	3000
PPid:	1000
Uid:	1000	1000	1000	1000
Gid:	1000	1000	1000	1000
SigBlk:	0000000000004000
SigIgn:	0000000000000000
SigCgt:	0000000180004002
